product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Rectangular Sleeping Bag Liner - Polyester/Cotton - Special Buy
long_description: If you're tired of trying to clean the inside of your sleeping bag and it's constantly getting dirty, then the polyester/cotton ALPS Mountaineering Rectangular Sleeping Bag Liner is a great solution. Using a liner prevents trail dirt from transfering to the inside of your sleeping bag. Liner is easy to remove from your sleeping bag and toss in the washing machine when you get home from a trip. Polyester/cotton fabric combines the soft feel of cotton with the moisture-wicking properties of polyester. Doubles as a sheet for use in summertime. ALPS Mountaineering Rectangular Sleeping Bag Liner comes with a stuff sack. Special buy.
short_description: If you're tired of trying to clean the inside of your sleeping bag and it's constantly getting dirty, then the polyester/cotton ALPS Mountaineering Rectangular Sleeping Bag Liner is a great solution.
